headline: Johnson Controls International (JCI) Appoints Chris Scalia As New Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: Recently, Johnson Controls International (JCI) has experienced significant momentum, with its stock price surging 35% over the last quarter. The appointment of Chris Scalia as Executive Vice President and CHRO might have added confidence among investors regarding strategic HR leadership. This period also saw JCI approve a quarterly dividend and increase its equity buyback authorization significantly, which generally signals a strong financial position. headline: Wall Street Lunch: June CPI Shows Tariff Impact On Prices
summary: A mixed retail inflation report indicated that tariffs are starting to have upward pressure on prices.

headline: Johnson Controls Appoints Chris Scalia as Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), a global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, today announced the appointment of Chris Scalia as executive vice president and chief human resources officer (CHRO). Scalia will report to CEO Joakim Weidemanis and serve as a member of the company's executive committee.
